ygData.subject: Compute fits to NASA thermochemical forms
ygData.msgSnippet: Is there software in Cantera to fit thermochemical data to the NASA thermochemical forms? In the past I ve done this using some Chemkin auxiliary packages, but

Is there software in Cantera to fit thermochemical data to the NASA
thermoc=
hemical forms? In the past I've done this using some Chemkin
auxiliary pack=
ages, but I don't have access to these anymore. I
computed output over a ra=
nge of temperatures for the H, S, Cp, etc.,
using a quantum chemistry packa=
ge, and would now like to get this into
the proper form.
